Title: Silverlight Sudoku (2010)
Description: This is a Silverlight 4 interactive Sudoku game, full source included.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is a Silverlight 4 interactive Sudoku game, full source included.

The implementation uses a Mediator class to construct and manage the presentation of a Sudoku puzzle. The solution technique is brute force recursion and generally takes about 1 second for any given puzzle.

The application has been deployed here http://londonelegance.com/tyburn-consultancy/sudoku/

Author: Garry Vass (WPF/Silverlight Specialist)
